OOC Ryo  Send me a private message with your Email adress if you need 
any ideas, I have stories from other RPG's that might help.

Lady Hawk continued to walk with Repressor behind her. She couldn't 
wait to be let go, she just wanted to be dealt a little dignity. she 
watched off in the distance. she couldn't see much, just more 
sand. "Where exactly are we going?" she asked in a cranky agitated 
voice.
